title: Help, i'm lagging
body: Suddenly i started to lag when playing Lol(20fps on all settings,even on very low). I ussualy have 150+fps on very high settings and i can play almost every new game.*reinstaled the game 3 times*

replies.body: It sounds like you're having frame rate issues, and not necessarily a connection related lag.  You could have some out of date drivers or just general wear and tear that's causing this.  I suggest starting off with our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure that everything is running in order with your PC.  Let me know if you have any questions!
